unnormalised: The transfer window is heating up! Real Kashmir FC will need strong signings, especially after losing key players. I hear whispers of a young striker from Manipur attracting attention. Reminds me of that underdog story in "Chak De! India." The Rs. 50 Lakh release clause seems reasonable, considering his potential. Let's hope they scouted well in the Durand Cup in Kolkata. The team needs depth for the I-League. Need to travel 2500 km to away games is a concern too. Good luck!
normalised: The transfer window is heating up! Real Kashmir F C will need strong signings, especially after losing key players. I hear whispers of a young striker from Manipur attracting attention. Reminds me of that underdog story in "Chak De! India." The rupee fifty lakh release clause seems reasonable, considering his potential. Let's hope they scouted well in the Durand Cup in Kolkata. The team needs depth for the I-League. Need to travel two thousand five hundred kilometer to away games is a concern too. Good luck!
